ygData.subject: Re: Yield Policy
ygData.msgSnippet: i didn t say that was right now did i? there are jerks everywhere you go, unavoidable....all you can do is report em....that they re disrupting you....that
ygData.messageBody:
i didn't say that was right now did i? there are jerks everywhere you go,
unavoidable....all you can do is report em....that they're disrupting
you....that isn't right for them to do that, but i do think if you're at a place
for an item and you get no exp, you shouldn't have to leave like that..that's
not fair

FlashD wrote:

> From: "FlashD" <DunleyG@...>
>
> First come First Served
>
> YA RIGHT !!!!!
>
> So Mik and Mystic If that's your idea of fairness then the next time a
> level 50 wizard shows up and nukes a mob my group has been camping for
> hours , should I tell them "Mik says its first com first served" and to go
> away. Think about it.
